synopsis:
While the Sorceress, Adam and the others look on helplessly, Skeletor his newfound power to evil lengths, plunging Eternia into chaos.

(Source: Netflix)

Adam calls down the power of Grayskull without wielding his sword and clashes with Skeletor, then sets sights on an improbable target.

(Source: Netflix)

As Evil-Lyn begins to doubt Skeletor's motives, she recalls how she first met the power-mad tyrant and ultimately decides to make an unexpected movie.

(Source: Netflix)

Aware of her legacy, Teela tries to manifest her powers to call for aid in their struggle against Evil-Lyn, while Adam partners with an unlikely ally.

(Source: Netflix)

title.en: Comes with Everything You See Here

synopsis:
Teela assumes her new role and Adam reclaim the Sword of Power as the final confrontation for the fate of Eternia — and the entire universe — begins.

(Source: Netflix)
